title: restoring a wallet fails

body: PS: I've also tried with my mnemonic 12-words phrase and it also doesn't work. I don't understand why I would have failed to properly save both my keyfile/password and my mnemonic phrase. I rather suspect some incompatibility with my rather old wallet
For what it's worth, here's the name of my keyfile: UTC--2016-06-17T13-59-21.252895900Z--c9cf69b2f39efe8720b9485f37e5e2001251f8dd

nevermind I was using a wrong password.

Sorry for the noise
